subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Lovie Smith is one of two African-American coaches whose teams are among the final four left in the  N.F.L.  playoffs.  Colts’ Coach Tony Dungy is the other.
snippet: Lovie Smith is one of two African-American coaches whose teams are among the final four left in the  N.F.L.  playoffs.  Colts’ Coach Tony Dungy is the other.
